name.baseName: Painting ; Bamboo, rattan furniture ; Coating (solvent-based) ; Spray painting ; All sizes; NESPS2
涂饰 ; 竹、藤制家具 ; 涂料（溶剂型） ; 喷漆 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time of waste gas pollution production section (hours/year)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time of waste gas pollution production section (hours/year)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所描述的技术应用涉及在各种规模的生产中采用溶剂型涂料对竹和藤制家具进行喷漆。末端处理技术用于控制喷漆作业产生的污染颗粒物(PM2.5 - PM10)和挥发性有机化合物(VOCs)排放。这些技术包括袋式过滤器、并联单筒旋风系统、水帘湿法喷雾净化器、化学纤维过滤颗粒物、活性碳纤维或分子筛吸附/解吸/催化氧化、活性碳吸附/解吸催化燃烧、蒸汽解吸、低温等离子体、光解以及一次性活性碳吸附等VOCs处理技术。某些工艺还涉及未经处理的排放物直接排放。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码21,三级代码212.0文件，在完整版文件中第428页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为涂料（溶剂型），此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time of waste gas pollution production section (hours/year)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/[设备额定功率（千瓦）×运行时间（小时/年）]。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isOthers (chemical fiber filtration)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time of waste gas pollution production section (hours/year)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是其他（化学纤维过滤），其效率为80，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/[设备额定功率（千瓦）×运行时间（小时/年）]。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isOthers (water curtain wet spray purification)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time of waste gas pollution production section (hours/year)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是其他（水帘湿式喷雾净化），其效率为80，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/[设备额定功率（千瓦）×运行时间（小时/年）]。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isSingle cylinder (multiple cylinders in parallel) cyclone，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time of waste gas pollution production section (hours/year)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是单筒（多筒并联）旋风，其效率为80，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/[设备额定功率（千瓦）×运行时间（小时/年）]。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisOthers (activated carbon fiber or zeolite adsorption/desorption/catalytic oxidation)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是其他（活性炭纤维或沸石吸附/脱附/催化氧化），其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/[设备额定功率（千瓦）×运行时间（小时/年）]。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisActivated carbon adsorption/desorption catalytic combustion method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是活性炭吸附/脱附催化燃烧法，其效率为80，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/[设备额定功率（千瓦）×运行时间（小时/年）]。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isDirect discharge，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time of waste gas pollution production section (hours/year)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是直接排放，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/[设备额定功率（千瓦）×运行时间（小时/年）]。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisAdsorption + steam desorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management50，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time of waste gas pollution production section (hours/year)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是吸附/蒸汽解吸，其效率为50，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/[设备额定功率（千瓦）×运行时间（小时/年）]。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisLow temperature plasma，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management30，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
